nodes.text: The EG labor droid was a model of labor droid manufactured by Cybot Galactica. In the year 0 ABY, they were used to sweep up during the Festival of Four Honorings, an event held at Marblewood Estate on the planet Wukkar. In the mansion's droid repair room, partially dismantled sections of EGs were hooked into high-end Cybot Galactica maintenance equipment or laid out on nearby workbenches.
The EG labor droid first appeared in Scoundrels, a 2013 Star Wars Legends novel written by Timothy Zahn.
